text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Aaaaaargghhh―!! I, I've… What a mess
I've made of this run!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That was ab-so-lutely not! By any means! 
an exemplary run!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That was the run of a flunk-student! 
Now, I'm Bakushin-ing down the road to 
becoming a delinqueeeent―!!

Can you recover from failure? That's the 
real key to success, I told her.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
…So, in other words, what you're saying
is, I'm still Bakushin-ing down the
glorious honor student road at this
very moment!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I seeee! ……I won't let this
happen again! Let's start training
straightaway!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I have to set an example for everyone! 
There's no time to stand still!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
choice_data_list: You're supposed to be a role model for everyone, right?
You're supposed to be a role model for everyone, right?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
…Yes, I have not yet resigned from my 
position as class president……!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
In order to carry out my solemn duty
of guiding each and every Uma Musume,
I must keep going with everything I've
got!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
A model student from cradle to grave!! 
Because that's exactly what Sakura 
Bakushin O is!
